{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'\u0113', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: He kupu ka huaina i ngā mōteatea, i te mutunga o ētahi rārangi kōrero. Kāore ōna whakamārama tūturu, heoi anō pea tāna he whakaū i te tangi o te ngākau, he whai kia huatau te kupu.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ewe', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Te ewe me ngā kiriuhi kukune ka peia atu i te kōpū i muri i te whānautanga mai o te pēpē, o te kūao rānei.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'\u0113nei', '.whakam\u0101oritanga: Te takitini o te kupu 'tēnei', e tohu ana i ētahi mea e rua, neke atu, e tata ana ki te kaikōrero.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ehu', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Kua kore e kōratarata (o te wai, o tētahi atu wē rānei), i te nui o ngā hanga ririki e tāiri ana i roto.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ekeeke', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka mahi te tokorua i ētahi mahi pērā i te kuhu atu i te ure tū ki te puta, e tokomauri ai te tangata.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'eke', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka mahi kia neke whakarunga (tētahi mea).

{'root_number':3, 'trunk':'e', 'branch_n.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ina tū i mua i te ingoa tangata, i te tūingoa rānei mō te tangata, e tohu ana kei te hāngai pū te kōrero ki taua tangata. He wā anō ka tuaruatia i muri i te ingoa.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ewe', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: He huinga pūtau kōpae te hanga ka tipu i te kōpū o te whaea, o te whāereere, hei hono i ana toto ki ō te kukune, e whakawhitihia ai te hāora, te kai, me ngā para.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ene', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka kōrero ki tētahi atu i runga i te wairua whakamihi, whakangāwari, kia tutuki ai i a ia tētahi kaupapa e hiahia ana koe kia tutuki i a ia, mōu te painga.

tauira: Ko te ngutu o te erepata he mea rerekē noa atu i tō ētahi atu kurī. Arā, ko tōna ihu he mea tuku kia roa rawa, tae ki te waru putu te roa, ko ngā pongaponga, arā ngā puta ihu, kei te moremorenga, kei te pito

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ehuehu', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka mahi kia rere, kia marara ā-kōpata atu (tētahi momo wai) ki tētahi mea.
tauira: Ka ehuehungia atu he wai ki runga i te māra

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'engaenga', 'b.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka rere iho (te wai, te aha atu) i te niao o tētahi mea, i ngā paretai o tētahi rerenga wai, i te mea kua kī rawa.
tauira: I te tokomaha o ngā tāngata, ka engaenga atu ētahi ki te mahau o te whare.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'e', 'branch_n.whakam\u0101oritanga: I ngā wāhi ko te kupu 'ai' e whai mai ana i te tūmahi, te tūāhua rānei, ā, koia te kupu tū i mua, e tohu ana i te take ka mahia tētahi mahi, i te hua rānei ka puta i tētahi mahi.
tauira: E mārama ake ai koe ki ēnei karakia, me pānui ngā whakamārama a Te Pēhi.
Me pēhea e pai ake ai taku reo Māori?

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'\u0113neki',.whakam\u0101oritanga: Te takitini o te kupu 'tēneki', e tohu ana i ētahi mea e rua, neke atu, e tata ana ki te kaikōrero.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ea', 'branch_.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka whakahaeretia (ngā karakia, ngā mahi a te tohunga).
tauira: Ka ea te purenga

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'erangi', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: He kupu e tohu ana i te taupatupatu o te āhuatanga whai i muri mai ki tētahi atu kei mua e rere ana.
tauira: Kāhore ahau e mea kia kotahi, erangi kia tokomaha atu
Kua tae rawa ia ki te wā e tika ana kia makere mai ia i taua tūranga nō te kaumātuatanga ōna, erangi, kua whakahoua anō
He tokoiti ngā wāhine whai tamariki nohinohi i puta ki te mahi i ngā rā o mua, engari kua rerekē katoa i ēnei rā.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ekeeke', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka mahi te tokorua i ētahi mahi kia tokomauri ai, pērā i te kuhu i te ure tū ki te tara, ka werowero ai ā tuhaina rawatia te tātea.
tauira: Ka tahuri te toa mā muri ekeeke ai i te uwha.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'\u0113r\u0101.whakam\u0101oritanga: Roa noa atu ki mua (o te wā).
tauira: Utua ai au e rima herengi i te wiki. He utu pai rawa atu tēnei mōku i ērā rā
Ko tēnei momo hopi he hopi o ērā wā, ā, ko te ingoa ko 'taniwha' anō. Kīhai i kakara pēnei i ngā hopi o nāianei

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ero', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: He wai āhua kukū, he kōwhai tea te tae, ka puta i te whēwhē, i te hakihaki.
tauira: Ka kite au i te ero e papī mai ana i ngā hakihaki, ka hia ruaki.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'engari', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: I muri i te kīanga whakakāhore, e whakataki ana i tētahi whakaaro e tautoko ana, e whakaū ana i taua kōrero tuatahi.
tauira: Kei hopu tō ringa ki te aka tāepa, engari kia mau ki te aka matua
Kāhore ngā tikanga a te iwi i tīmata ake i te whakatupuranga kotahi, engari nō ngā whakatupuranga nui noa atu
Kāore hoki he karakia ki a ia mō ngā take ririki, engari mō ngā mea nunui anake
Kore rawa he tamaiti i mate wheke engari i mate ururoa katoa

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'eneene', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka whakaoho i te riri o tētahi atu, o ētahi atu, e tū ai tētahi tautohetohe.
tauira: Kua haurangi, kua eneene riri.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'eneene', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka kōrero ki tētahi atu i runga i te wairua whakamihi, whakangāwari, i tō hiahia kia whiwhi koe i tētahi mea kei a ia e pupuri ana.
tauira: Kei te eneene kai māna

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'eke', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka kukū haere (o te kai e tunua ana).

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ero', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Kāore e nui te kiko, te mōmona rānei i te tinana.
tauira: Ka āta whakatiki ia kia ero ai tana tinana.

{'root_number':2, 'trunk':'e', 'branch_n.whakam\u0101oritanga: I ngā rerenga hāngū, ka tū te kupu nei i mua tonu i te kaikawe i te mahi.
tauira: I tuhia te pukapuka Te Kaieke Tohorā e Witi Ihimaera.
He mea ngaki ngā kūmara e ngā ihu oneone rā.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'epa', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka rite tonu te haupatu ki tētahi hanga pērā i te kōhatu, he mea whiu e te ringa.
tauira: Kāore i mutu tā rāua epa i te kurī ki te kōhatu, koirā au i kohete ai i a rāua!

{'root_number':2, 'trunk':'emi', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka raru te ngākau, ka hē te wairua i te mahinga o tētahi mahi hē, i te mōhiotia rānei o tētahi mahi e whakaarotia ana kāore i tika, kāore i pai.
tauira: Nā te kitea ōna e takoto tahanga ana i emi ai te wahine.

{'root_number':2, 'trunk':'ehu', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Te hanga o tētahi mea ki te titiro atu, ki te rongo atu, ki te whāwhā atu.
tauira: Ruia te taitea, tū te ehu tapu

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'epeepe', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: He whanaunga kāore e tata ana, ā-toto nei.
tauira: Āna, he epeepe ērā nō tātau, inā rā nō te waka kotahi.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'e\u0101', 'br.whakam\u0101oritanga: He kupu tū motuhake e whakaatu ana i te ohorere, i te mīharo.
tauira: Eā! Kua mate tāu mōkai

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ewe', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Te wāhi o te tinana wahine, o te tinana whāereere rānei e tipu ai te kukune.
tauira: Ka whāwhā te tākuta kararehe i te ewe o te hipi, kia mōhio ai ia mēnā e hapū ana, kāore noa iho rānei.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'e', 'branch_n.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka mahi tahi ki te kupu 'mā' (me ōna āhua maha) ki te āta whakaatu i te tangata, i te hanga rānei ko ia ka mahi i tētahi mahi.
tauira: Māku e horoi ngā wharepaku - māu e tahitahi ngā papa.
Mā Pita koe e whakahoki.
Waiho mā te whakamā a ia e patu.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'\u0113tehi',.whakam\u0101oritanga: Te takitini o te kupu 'tētahi', e tohu ana i tētahi wāhanga o te katoa, he neke atu i te mea kotahi.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ero', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Kua pirau me te kaha haunga anō.
tauira: Kua ero te ika i te roa e whitia ana e te rā.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ero', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Tino kino te tūpuhi me te ngoikore anō.
tauira: Ero ana tana tinana, nā te kore kai.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'eke', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka taka (te wā, ki te wā rānei).
tauira: Kua eke te hāora me wehe atu te pahi.
Kua eke ki te wā e haere ai tātou.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ekieki', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: Roa noa atu te toro whakarunga, tino tawhiti rānei te noho mai i runga ake i te papa.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'e ai . . .',.whakam\u0101oritanga: He kupu whakataki i te whakaaro e whakapuakina ana e te tangata, e tohu ana nō wai ake taua whakaaro.
tauira: E ai tāna, ko te roke kurī te tino rīwai o ngā rīwai, engari ko te karupārera kē te mea pai ki a au.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'e', 'branch_n.whakam\u0101oritanga: I muri i te 'kore', i te 'kāore' me te 'kaua' (tae atu ki ngā kupu taurite), e mahi tahi ana ki aua kupu ki te kawe i te whakakāhoretanga.
tauira: Kore rawa au e whakaae - kei te hē kē tana mahi.
Kāore au e peka atu ki tō Mea rā, kei tūreiti au.
Kaua e whengua tō ihu ki te tāora nā!
Taupokina te huka kia kore ai e muia e te pōpokoriki.
Nā te kohu i kore ai e tau mai te waka rererangi i te hāora tika.
